name: Astro Protector VR - Cardboard
description:
This game was started during the Global Game Jam January 2014.

Welcome to the (VR) future, NOW!

Always wondered how it would look like to play Asteroids in first person 3D and also Virtual Reality?

This 3D game supports Virtual Reality (VR) devices Virtual Reality therefore is one of the few VR future ready titles out there.

Instructions:
- Choose to play in normal mode or VR mode
- VR Mode: slide your iPhone into your cardboard case etc
- VR Mode: Your head/neck/body is your controller!
- Shot 10 Asteroids as fast as possible!

Features:
- Accelerometer driven, move the device to look around
- Touch to shoot, or select auto fire mode
- Normal mode for traditional use of the game with accelerometer support
- Cardboard Virtual Reality (VR) and other compatible cases (Dive etc)
- iPad works with normal mode, unless you have a bigger VR case for iPads

For feedback or positive emotional support please send an email to support@area001.com
